DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : The aim measure caloric compensation ( CC ) eat absence hunger ( EAH ) 2 7 year-old French child regular eat context link measurement individual characteristic ( adiposity , age , gender ) parental feeding practice . Design : Three consecutive week identical lunch serve four preschool canteen reach 236 child . The first lunch control session . For CC situation ( week 2 ) , thirty minute lunch child offer preload ( 137 kcal ) . For EAH situation ( week 3 ) , ten minute lunch child expose palatable food ( 430 kcal ) . Food intake measure individual level . Parental eat behaviour feeding practice measure questionnaire . Child 's height weight measure medical doctor .
DOC.brief_title: Eating Absence Hunger Caloric Compensation Preschool Children , Link With Parental Feeding Practices
DOC.criteria: To register school canteen , provide parental approval Chronic disease food allergy .
